Gotify.description:
A simple server for sending and receiving messages.

Based on the official docker image: https://hub.docker.com/r/gotify/server, available for amd64 architecture only.
Gotify.more_info: Default username is admin and password is admin. For usage instructions visit the gotify Getting Started guide

/app/data.description: Choose a Share for the database, plugins and images for applications.  Eg: create a Share called gotify for this purpose.
/app/data.label: Database and App Images
